_comment: LT6202CS5 - High Speed, Low Noise, Rail-to-Rail Operational Amplifier configured as LNA with 20 dB gain
description: LT6202CS5 High Speed Low Noise Rail-to-Rail Op-Amp configured as LNA with 20 dB gain
_comment_G: Gain, dB (configured via external resistors for 20 dB gain = 10 V/V)
_comment_NF: Noise Figure, dB (calculated from 1.9 nV/√Hz input noise at 100 kHz)
_comment_BW_LNA: Bandwidth, Hz (10 MHz at 20 dB gain, from 100 MHz GBW)
_comment_Z_in: Input impedance, Ohms (very high input impedance, typical >1 GOhm)
_comment_V_max: Maximum output voltage, V (rail-to-rail operation, depends on supply voltage)
_comment_V_min: Minimum supply voltage, V (2.5V minimum from datasheet)
_comment_V_supply_max: Maximum supply voltage, V (12.6V maximum from datasheet)
_comment_input_noise: Input voltage noise, V/√Hz (1.9 nV/√Hz at 100 kHz from datasheet)
_comment_input_bias_current: Input bias current, A (1 nA typical from datasheet)
_comment_offset_voltage: Input offset voltage, V (1 mV maximum from datasheet)
_comment_gain_bandwidth: Gain-bandwidth product, Hz (100 MHz from datasheet)
_comment_slew_rate: Slew rate, V/µs (25 V/µs from datasheet)
_comment_quiescent_current: Quiescent supply current, A (3 mA maximum from datasheet)
_comment_temperature_range: Operating temperature range, °C (0°C to 70°C for CS5 variant)
